title: Gemini
description: When the cards were turned, they changed my life. The flick of a wrist as I revealed my hand changed destiny. My destiny.The loss at the poker table was the first step onto my ultimate path. True, my siblings warned me about gambling. Our mission must never be jeopardised, they preached.When you lose, you gain. The spiral of fate took hold when Athena held a gun to my head. A trapped woman desperately fighting for her freedom. Was she a goddess of war? Or a thorn in my side? Rescuing her could mean the end of me.
author: Rachel Medhurst
